statements: SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_address, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT id, email_response FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT email_address, sentiment_category FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY email_address ASC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT email_address, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, email_response FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_category = 'Negative' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY sentiment_category ASC, sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT email_content, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT response_content FROM tailored_email_responses WHERE sentiment_score_range = 'Positive';
SELECT id, sentiment_score, email_content FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, email_content FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY id;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT MIN(sentiment_score) AS lowest_score, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE id < 100;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT email, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT email, sentiment_label FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 5;
SELECT response_text FROM EmailResponses WHERE response_category='Positive';
SELECT sentiment_label, response_category FROM SentimentEmailMapping ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive' ORDER BY email ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_text FROM EmailResponses WHERE response_category IN ('Complaint', 'Feedback') ORDER BY response_category, id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.sentiment_label, e.response_text FROM SentimentEmailMapping s INNER JOIN EmailResponses e ON s.response_category = e.response_category ORDER BY s.sentiment_label ASC, e.id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sd.id, sd.email, se.sentiment_score, se.sentiment_label FROM SentimentAnalysisData sd INNER JOIN SentimentEmailMapping se ON sd.sentiment_label = se.sentiment_label ORDER BY sd.email DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT customer_name, message FROM SentimentAnalysisData ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM EmailResponses;
SELECT customer_name, response_time FROM EmailResponses WHERE response_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, message FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 0 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, sentiment_type FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, contact_number FROM CustomerDetails WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, response FROM EmailResponses WHERE response_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT email, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 5;
SELECT template_subject, template_body FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT name FROM user_info WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT category_name FROM sentiment_categories WHERE category_id < 5;
SELECT id, email, sentiment_score, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 5;
SELECT email, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT template_subject, template_body FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email, name, job_title FROM user_info WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM sentiment_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
